It's not in counted time, but in the freedom to change your mind, follow a dolphin, stop where the water becomes crystal, follow the breath of the sea.

dailyCruisePage.title: Daily Cruise
dailyCruisePage.subtitle: A day worth a lifetime.
intro: Your adventure begins in silence. There's no rush.
Only the sound of waves caressing the hull of the Sargon catamaran, as we set sail towards the crystal,clear waters of the Tavolara Marine Protected Area, a place where nature still breathes freely.
How much grace this stretch of sea holds, your eyes fill, your heart melts.
destinations: The beaches of Lu Impostu, La Cinta, Cala Brandinchi, not seen, but felt: in the salt, in the wind, in the silence that surrounds them.
Capo Coda Cavallo, where the wind tells ancient routes, of sails, of trade, of destinies crossed between the seas.
And then, Molara and Tavolara, not rocks in the sea, but living guardians of stories: of battles, of kingdoms, of secrets kept with grace.
experience: Here, every horizon is memory. Every wave, a breath of the past. Below the keels, fish that dance. On the seabed, gorgonians that tell ancient stories.
Every dive into its waters is not just a plunge, but a dialogue with the past. Every breath, a bond with those who walked here before you.
But this experience goes beyond the memory of history.
On board, your palate encounters essential Sardinia: freshly baked warm bread, cheese that tastes of mountain and time, a glass of Cannonau that tells of earth, sun and working hands.
Every bite, a gesture of love. Every dish, a lived story, not told, but delivered.
Served… as a gift. With silence. With respect. With soul.
At the return hour, Sargon comes back slowly, but you don't return as before. Something here has touched you, not with noise, but with truth.
Because this was not a day. It was an encounter. With Sardinia. With yourself. With time that, for once, decided to wait for you.

sunsetVoyagePage.title: Sunset Voyage
sunsetVoyagePage.subtitle: An hour when time doesn't flow. It only breathes.
intro: When the sun rests on the horizon, Sargon doesn't set sail, it arranges itself.
Like an altar of light and water, sailing and at anchor, among the sleeping islands.
Here, there's no adventure to tell. There's only presence:
moments: glasses of wine that taste of root and wind
laughter that never ends, because it doesn't need a finale
experience: The flavors? Essential. Not exhibited, but offered as gifts.
It's not an aperitif. It's a suspended moment, where the sea listens to you, the sky embraces you, and you, finally, stop searching. You let yourself be found.
The sun settles on the horizon, and the sea returns what it has welcomed: your presence, your silence, your wonder.

signatureServicesPage.title: Signature Services
signatureServicesPage.subtitle: Where excellence meets the sea
intro: The exclusive catering service prepared at Pentumas restaurant and served on board Sargon is not simply a meal on a boat: it is a sensory journey woven with respect for the sea, land and time, offered with the delicacy of those who know that true luxury lies in the essential.

The food comes directly from the heart of Sardinia: the freshest seasonal ingredients, carefully cultivated by a historic family,run organic farm. Nothing is standardized or replicated elsewhere. Each dish is artisanally crafted in the restaurant, then transported on board to be experienced in its entirety, with the scent of the sea, the sunlight and the gentle sway of the catamaran.

The wines tell the story of the surrounding hills, the spirits, such as the award,winning Gin di Nonna Luigina, preserve childhood memories and sustainable innovation. But what makes this catering truly special is its spirit: on board Sargon, we don't just serve, we share. No imposed schedules or formalities: we listen, accompany, welcome.

Here, true luxury is the quality of the moment: savoring not just the food, but also the light, the silence, the sway of the catamaran and sincere company. Eating on board Sargon means rediscovering ancient conviviality: slow, authentic, rooted in the territory. Each bite is a tribute to the land, each glass a toast to the beauty of being present, now, on the clearest sea in the Mediterranean.

pairingsIntro: Each menu is accompanied by local wines, carefully selected from Fratelli Sanna or Teodoro wineries: authentic expressions of the land that nourishes us, guardians of its terroir and soul. They are not simple labels, but stories told in a glass.

The culinary experience culminates with an intimate tasting of local spirits and traditional sweets, featuring the Sardinian Gin di "Nonna Luigina", born from the ancient citrus Sa Pompia. A liqueur that tastes of roots, sun and innovation, awarded the Oscar Green 2020 for Creativity, for its ability to unite tradition and sustainability in one sip.
Each wine is chosen to tell a fragment of Sardinia: the stone, the wind, the salt, the silence.
For personalized tastings or custom pairings, your consultant on Sargon is at your disposal.
signatureServicesPage.wineListQuote: On board Sargon we only share what has a soul: A small selection of artisan spirits and rare labels, chosen not for completeness but for truth. Because here, every drop must deserve the silence of the surrounding sea.

sparkling.name: Ferrari Perlé
sparkling.description: The elegance of Trentino in a glass. Fine bubbles like silk, candied citrus and white flowers: a toast that speaks of mountains and artisanal precision.

sparkling.name: Cà del Bosco Prestige Franciacorta
sparkling.description: The beating heart of Franciacorta. Complex, vibrant, with notes of golden apple, toasted almond and noble yeast. A wine to contemplate, like sunset over the sea.

sparkling.name: D’Oro Brut
sparkling.description: Mediterranean freshness in bubbles. Citrus, white peach, and a savoriness reminiscent of the sea breeze. Light, sincere, perfect for an aperitif.

sparkling.name: D’Oro Rosé Brut
sparkling.description: A rosé that dances. Wild strawberries, freshly picked cherry, and a mineral texture that ties it to the sea. Pale pink color, sunlit soul.

sparkling.name: Brut Franciacorta Mosnel
sparkling.description: The apotheosis of Italian bubbles. Structure, depth, balance. Notes of dried fruit, bread crust, and orange blossom. For those seeking silence within the celebration.

otherWhites.name: Faula Isola dei Nuraghi (Arvisionado)
otherWhites.description: Ancient grape varieties, natural vinification. Aromas of Mediterranean maquis, wildflowers, and apricot. Authentic, unfiltered, like the sea in the morning.

otherWhites.name: Origina Cantina Theo
otherWhites.description: Fresh, agile, sincere. Citrus, lemon balm, and a pleasant saline note. The ideal companion for a light aperitif, among laughter and waves.

reds.name: Vostè Cannonau Io Lei
reds.description: Cannonau told intimately. Cherry, sweet spices, a touch of licorice. Warm, enveloping, generous — like an embrace at dusk.

reds.name: Abbèru Cantina Dessena
reds.description: A wine born in the heart of Barbagia. Deep, structured, with notes of plum, tobacco, and myrtle. Silent, yet unforgettable.

aboutPage.title: Who We Are
aboutPage.subtitle: A story of sea, authenticity, and presence
aboutPage.introTitle: Sargon: More than a name, a journey
intro: Sargon is not a brand. It is a vision. A way of experiencing the sea that has nothing to do with luxury for display, but everything to do with authenticity, slowness, and respect.

Born from the intuition of Studio Marine, a strategic laboratory that designs experiences rooted in territory and meaning, Sargon takes its name from an ancient king, not of conquest, but of connection. A name that evokes journeys, encounters, dialogue between cultures and seas.

On board Sargon, there are no fixed itineraries. There are no standardized menus. There is only space: for silence, for listening, for presence. The catamaran becomes a place where the sea teaches you to slow down, where luxury is not what you see, but what you feel.
aboutPage.studioMarineTitle: Studio Marine: The laboratory behind Sargon
studioMarine: Studio Marine is not a tourism company. It is a strategic design laboratory that creates experiences of meaning. Every project is born from a question: how can we return to an authentic relationship with territory, with people, with time?
Sargon is the answer to that question applied to the sea. An experience designed to break away from standardization, to rediscover slowness as luxury, and silence as wealth.
The team behind Studio Marine brings together strategic vision, deep knowledge of Sardinian territory, and the ability to translate values into tangible experiences, never imposed, always shared.

values.title: Authenticity
values.description: No masks. No performances. Every experience on Sargon is real, from the food that comes from local farms, to the captain who knows every rock by name, to the wines that tell the story of the surrounding hills.

values.title: Minimalism
values.description: Less is more. Fewer guests on board, fewer stops but deeply lived, less haste and more presence. True luxury is not in accumulation, but in essential quality.

values.title: Respect
values.description: For the sea, for the territory, for silence. For those who welcome and those who are welcomed. Every gesture on board Sargon is a gesture of care, never invasive, always attentive.

values.title: Presence
values.description: The opposite of distraction. On Sargon, we don't entertain, we create space for you to finally be present. To listen to the wind, to feel the water, to rediscover the beauty of a moment that asks for nothing but to be lived.

team: Every experience on Sargon is guided by people who don't just work at sea, they live it. The captain is not a driver: he is a storyteller, a keeper of routes and secrets. The stewardess is not a server: she is a presence that accompanies without imposing.
Behind every detail, from the food prepared at Pentumas restaurant to the wines selected from local wineries, there are people who have chosen quality over quantity, truth over appearance.
Because Sargon is not a service. It is an encounter. And every encounter is made possible by those who believe that true luxury is in authenticity.
